titles.title: International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2025
International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2025
International Nuclear Energy Financing Act of 2025

To provide for advocation of support for nuclear energy, and establish a nuclear energy assistance trust fund, at the World Bank, the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development, and other international financial institutions, as appropriate, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 39 - 10.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-23.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 13.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
